comments:
This ClassCastException occurs countless times in the Irrlicht project and 
prevents many features from completing successfully for that project.

Steps to reproduce:
- load the Irrlicht project (http://irrlicht.sourceforge.net/) with the DOM 
Indexer enabled
- I'll attach an abstracted project that can be used to reproduce the bug with 
the DOM Indexer
